name: podamShouldGenerateANonNullPojoForAbstractTypesWithConcreteImplementation

testSteps.description: When I add a specific type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConcreteTestPojo for an abstract type or interface class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConcreteTestPojo@1b0063a must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConcreteTestPojo
When I remove a specific type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo for an abstract type or interface
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo
Then the Pojo should be null

title: Podam should generate a non null POJO for Abstract types with a concrete type
